# Chemicals for Botany
Giving these chemicals to [color=#9fed58]Botany[/color] allows them to do a better job, often allowing them to make valuable chemicals for you.
## Basic Chemicals
These chemicals allow botanists to increase the potency of their plants, manipulate or reverse their growth speed, and allows them to heal their plants.
## Mutation Chemicals
These chemicals allow botanists to mutate plants, and to handle the effects of their mutations.
## Nutritional Chemicals
While not strictly necessary for botanists, these chemicals can give novice botanists an easier time.
